subject: Attention Beneficiary $2.5 M
body:
Attention Beneficiary $2.5 Million.
This is to notify all beneficiaries about the latest development
concerning all the payments that are left in our custody, which yours
are inclusive besides you were given a bill of Sum in order to receive
your payment which we didnâ€™t hear from you for some time now. Hence
our Head Office is now offering a Special BONUS to help all our
customers that are having delayed payment due to high prices imposed
on them. In other words we are now requesting that those involved
should pay the sum of  $95.00 only to receive all their payment
abandoned in our custody.
You can track your first payment been sent this morning and confirm it available
https:/ /www.westernunion.com/global-service/tracktransfersuccess
SENDER..Barry Deakin
AMOUNT ... $4,500
MTCN ....2409730252
Besides, my dear, this is the opportunity for you  to comply and your
funds shall be transferred to your designated address. But remember
that after (2 DAYS) you did not make the payment then we will divert
your funds to the Government Account, So to avoid problems, you have
to send the fee before 2 days so that you can get your funds Released
without delay..
Again after (Two DAYS) we will enter a new project. That is the reason
we decided to help all our customers before we enter into the new
project,So be advised to send the  $$95.00 immediately so that we will
release the sent payment for your pick up today. Be advised that there
is no time for us to call on the phone unless you can call
+2348148228313 after payment of  $95.00 you will start receiving your
FUND Total $2.5 Million.
INFORMATION VIA WESTERN UNION OR MONEY GRAM TRANSFER, RIA MONEY
TRANSFER OR MY WALLET ACCOUNT,  NOTE  $95.00 only ITUNES CARD IS
ACCEPTED attached to email
RECEIVER NAME::: JAMES OBORJI CHARLES
COUNTRY: BENIN DU REPUBLIC
ADDRESS::: 01 BP 3391 COTONOU BENIN
Text Question_: In God
Text Answer_: We Trust
Amount_:  $95.00
The moment I receive the payment of $ $95.00 your Total fund US$2.5
Million will be released to you without any further delay, Please
contact us as we strive to ensure that you will always receive prompt
and courteous  attention.
Thanks for your patronage
Mr. Desmond Connor
Western union office Benin Du Republic
This is our conduct code (1369)
E-mail: 
westernuniontransfer975@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Attention Beneficiary $2.5 M
body:
Hello Mr. Desmond Connor,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite a surprise to hear about these payments left in your custody, including mine. I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what this is all about.

Could you please provide more details? For instance, how did my payment end up in your custody? And why was there a bill of sum imposed on me?

Also, could you clarify what the special BONUS your Head Office is offering entails? Is it related to the fee that needs to be paid?

I noticed some parts of your message are missing some information like the amount and MTCN for tracking the first payment sent this morning. Could you kindly provide these details?

Lastly, I'm curious about this new project you mentioned that will start after two days. What kind of project is it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Keri
